entry.title: WIND WARNING , Bonavista
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bonavista 8:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: WSW 46 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending early this evening then clearing. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along parts of the coast in the evening and after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
